Classes/MBImagesElement.html.name: MBImagesElement
Classes/MBImagesElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger images element.

Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.name: elements
Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.abstract: The elements of the section. The key of the dictionary is the name of the element, the value is an instance of a MBElement that represents the object.

Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.name: -initWithSectionId:Order:Elements:AvailableAt:
Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.abstract: Initializes a section with a sectionId and the elements returned by the api.

Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.abstract: Initializes a section with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.name: -mapElementsToObject:withMapping:
Classes/MBSection.html#/c:objc(cs)MBSect.abstract: Copy a set of elements values from this Entry to a custom object. This is very useful if you want to initialize a custom object you created with the values of the elements of this section. The properties of elements can be queried with the dot notation, e.g. image.firstImage.url, if no property is queried the object mapped is the value of the element, for example if it’s a MBTextElement it will map the string value.

Classes/MBBlock.html#/c:objc(cs)MBBlock(.abstract: Initializes a block with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/MBLegalContract.html.name: MBLegalContract

Classes/MBGeofenceParameter.html#/c:objc.name: northEastCoordinate

Protocols/MBParameter.html.name: MBParameter

Classes/MBSortParameter.html.name: MBSortParameter
Classes/MBSortParameter.html.abstract: A parameter used to sort the elements retuned.

Classes/MBPaginationParameter.html.name: MBPaginationParameter
Classes/MBPaginationParameter.html.abstract: A parameter used to paginate the elements retuned.

Classes/MBFilterParameter.html.name: MBFilterParameter
Classes/MBFilterParameter.html.abstract: A parameter used to filter the elements retuned.

Classes/MBGeofenceParameter.html.name: MBGeofenceParameter
Classes/MBGeofenceParameter.html.abstract: A parameter used to filter the elements retuned, the elements returned will be in the geofence square defined by the coordinates.

Classes/MBGeneralParameter.html.name: MBGeneralParameter
Classes/MBGeneralParameter.html.abstract: A general parameter passed to the MBurger Api.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getProjectWithSuccess:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the informations about the project, it calls -[MBClient getProjectIncludingContracts:Success:Failure] with the paramter includeContracts setted to true.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getBlockWithBlockId:Parameters:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the block of the project with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the block of the project with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getBlockWithBlockId:Parameters:IncludingSections:AndElements:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the block of the project with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getSectionsWithBlockId:Parameters:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the sections of the block with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the sections of the block with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getSectionWithId:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the section with the specified id and all.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getSectionWithId:IncludeElements:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the section with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.name: +getElementsWithSectionId:Success:Failure:
Classes/MBClient.html#/c:objc(cs)MBClien.abstract: Retrieve the elements of the section with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html.name: MBClient
Classes/MBClient.html.abstract: The main client of the SDK, this is your entry point for all the calls you do with MBurger.

Classes/MBPaginationInfo.html.name: MBPaginationInfo
Classes/MBPaginationInfo.html.abstract: This class contains meta information abaut the pagination, it’s usually returned when an array is requested by the api.

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: apiToken
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: The API token used to make all the requests to the api.

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: pushToken
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: The token used to make calls to the push service.

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: locale
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: The locale used to make the requests.

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: plugins
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: An array of plugin objects that can add functionality to the core MBurger.

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: development
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: It’s true if it’s in development mode

Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.name: -localeString
Classes/MBManager.html#/c:objc(cs)MBMana.abstract: The locale string sended to the api.
